overview_of_class:
America's demographic landscape is changing quickly, spawning some of the most fascinating and consequential journalism coming out of newsrooms today. This class will show you how to
combine data analysis, documentary research and sharp interviews to produce strong, original stories. This will be done through hands-on learning, lively discussion, enlightening reading and a
few speakers .
name: Special Topics
title: JOUR JOUR 480-0-20 Special Topics
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.

overview_of_class: This is a hands-on, skills-based class that teaches how to produce a podcast ? what the building blocks are. And you end up with a produced podcast.
